File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. If you no longer need to take action, use the command ‘end’ to stop.'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 'Now I need to work on task 4: create ModifyBannerApp.java main class that simulates the use case flow. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. Command Engineer2.write_new_code executed: The file /home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/ModifyBanner_1766836196/Banner.java has been successfully created, with content:
package com.example.banner;

/**
 * Banner.java
 * Represents a banner advertisement with an identifier and image path.
 * This class is a simple POJO (Plain Old Java Object) to hold banner data.
 */
public class Banner {
    private String id;          // Unique identifier for the banner
    private String imagePath;   // Path or URL to the banner image

    /**
     * Default constructor.
     */
    public Banner() {
        // Empty constructor for flexibility
    }

    /**
     * Parameterized constructor to create a banner with initial values.
     *
     * @param id        Unique identifier for the banner
     * @param imagePath Path or URL to the banner image
     */
    public Banner(String id, String imagePath) {
        this.id = id;
        this.imagePath = imagePath;
    }

    /**
     * Get the banner's unique identifier.
     *
     * @return banner id
     */
    public String getId() {
        return id;
    }

    /**
     * Set the banner's unique identifier.
     *
     * @param id new banner id
     */
    public void setId(String id) {
        this.id = id;
    }

    /**
     * Get the path or URL to the banner image.
     *
     * @return image path
     */
    public String getImagePath() {
        return imagePath;
    }

    /**
     * Set the path or URL to the banner image.
     *
     * @param imagePath new image path
     */
    public void setImagePath(String imagePath) {
        this.imagePath = imagePath;
    }

    /**
     * Returns a string representation of the banner for debugging.
     *
     * @return string representation
     */
    @Override
    public String toString() {
        return "Banner{" +
                "id='" + id + '\'' +
                ", imagePath='" + imagePath + '\'' +
                '}';
    }
}

File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. select, and modify banners with validation.\n * This class is a singleton to ensure a single instance per restaurant point.\n */\npublic class BannerManager {\n    private List<Banner> banners;\n    private static BannerManager instance;\n\n    // Private constructor for singleton pattern\n    private BannerManager() {\n        banners = new ArrayList<>();\n        // Initialize with some dummy banners for demonstration\n        initializeDummyBanners();\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Returns the singleton instance of BannerManager.\n     *\n     * @return BannerManager instance\n     */\n    public static BannerManager getInstance() {\n        if (instance == null) {\n            instance = new BannerManager();\n        }\n        return instance;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Initializes the to add\n     */\n    public void addBanner(Banner banner) {\n        if (banner != null) {\n            banners.add(banner);\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Returns a copy of the list of all banners.\n     *\n     * @return list of banners\n     */\n    public List<Banner> getBanners() {\n        return new ArrayList<>(banners); // Return copy to preserve encapsulation\n    }\n\n    /**\n image path\n     * @return true if update successful, false otherwise\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if validation fails\n     */\n    public boolean updateBannerImage(String bannerId, String newImagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException {\n        Banner banner = getBannerById(bannerId);\n        if (banner == null) {\n            System.err.println("Banner with id " + bannerId + " not found.");\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        // Validate the new image\n        validateImage(newImagePath);\n\n        // Update the image path\n        banner.setImagePath(newImagePath);\n        System.out.println("Banner image updated successfully for banner id: " + bannerId);\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image path based on simple criteria.\n     * This is a stub validation; in a real system, more comprehensive validation\n     * (e.g., file size, dimensions, format) would be performed.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath the image path to validate\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the image path is invalid\n     */\n    private void validateImage(String imagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException {\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Check for allowed image extensions\n        String lower = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        if (!(lower.endsWith(".jpg") || lower.endsWith(".jpeg") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".png") || lower.endsWith(".gif") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".bmp"))) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid image format. Allowed formats: .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif, .bmp");\n        }\n\n        // Additional validation could be added here (e.g., file size, dimensions)\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Displays the list of banners in a user-friendly format.\n     */\n    public void displayBanners() {\n        if (banners.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No banners available.");\n            return;\n        }\n        System.out.println("Available Banners:");\n        for (Banner banner : banners) {\n            System.out.println("  ID: " + banner.getId() + ", Image: " + banner.getImagePath());\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. image of a banner identified by bannerId.\n     * Validates the new image path before updating.\n     *\n     * @param bannerId      the id of the banner to update\n     * @param newImagePath  the new image path\n     * @return true if update successful, false otherwise\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if validation fails\n     */\n    public boolean updateBannerImage(String bannerId, String newImagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException {\n        Banner banner = getBannerById(bannerId);\n        if (banner == null) {\n            System.err.println("Banner with id " + bannerId + " not found.");\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        // Validate the new image\n        validateImage(newImagePath);\n\n        // Update the image path\n        banner.setImagePath(newImagePath);\n        System.out.println("Banner image updated successfully for banner id: " + bannerId);\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image path based on simple criteria.\n     * This is a stub validation; in a real system, more comprehensive validation\n     * (e.g., file size, dimensions, format) would be performed.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath the image path to validate\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the image path is invalid\n     */\n    private void validateImage(String imagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException {\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Check for allowed image extensions\n        String lower = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        if (!(lower.endsWith(".jpg") || lower.endsWith(".jpeg") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".png") || lower.endsWith(".gif") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".bmp"))) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid image format. Allowed formats: .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif, .bmp");\n        }\n\n        // Additional validation could be added here (e.g., file size, dimensions)\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Displays the list of banners in a user-friendly format.\n     */\n    public void displayBanners() {\n        if (banners.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No banners available.");\n            return;\n        }\n        System.out.println("Available Banners:");\n        for (Banner banner : banners) {\n            System.out.println("  ID: " + banner.getId() + ", Image: " + banner.getImagePath());\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. imagePath the image path to validate\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the image path is invalid\n     */\n    private void validateImage(String imagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException {\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Check for allowed image extensions\n        String lower = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        if (!(lower.endsWith(".jpg") || lower.endsWith(".jpeg") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".png") || lower.endsWith(".gif") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".bmp"))) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid image format. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. If you no longer need to take action, use the command ‘end’ to stop.'}, {'role': 'assistant', 'content': 'Now I need to work on task 4: create ModifyBannerApp.java main class that simulates the use case flow. banners for demonstration\n        initializeDummyBanners();\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Returns the singleton instance of BannerManager.\n     *\n     * @return BannerManager instance\n     */\n image path\n     * @return true if update successful, false otherwise\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if validation fails\n     */\n    public boolean updateBannerImage(String bannerId, String newImagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException {\n        Banner banner = getBannerById(bannerId);\n        if (banner == null) {\n            System.err.println("Banner with id " + bannerId + " not found.");\n            return false;\n        }\n\n        // Validate the new image\n        validateImage(newImagePath);\n\n        // Update the image path\n        banner.setImagePath(newImagePath);\n        System.out.println("Banner image updated successfully for banner id: " + bannerId);\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image path based on simple criteria.\n     * This is a stub validation; in a real system, more comprehensive validation\n     * (e.g., file size, dimensions, format) would be performed.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath the image path to validate\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the image path is invalid\n     */\n    private void validateImage(String imagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException {\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Check for allowed image extensions\n        String lower = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        if (!(lower.endsWith(".jpg") || lower.endsWith(".jpeg") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".png") || lower.endsWith(".gif") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".bmp"))) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid image format. Allowed formats: .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif, .bmp");\n        }\n\n        // Additional validation could be added here (e.g., file size, dimensions)\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Displays the list of banners in a user-friendly format.\n     */\n    public void displayBanners() {\n        if (banners.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No banners available.");\n            return;\n        }\n        System.out.println("Available Banners:");\n        for (Banner banner : banners) {\n            System.out.println("  ID: " + banner.getId() + ", Image: " + banner.getImagePath());\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. imagePath the image path to validate\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the image path is invalid\n     */\n    private void validateImage(String imagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException {\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Check for allowed image extensions\n        String lower = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        if (!(lower.endsWith(".jpg") || lower.endsWith(".jpeg") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".png") || lower.endsWith(".gif") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".bmp"))) {\n            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid image format. Allowed formats: .jpg, .jpeg, .png, .gif, .bmp");\n        }\n\n        // Additional validation could be added here (e.g., file size, dimensions)\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Displays the list of banners in a user-friendly format.\n     */\n    public void displayBanners() {\n        if (banners.isEmpty()) {\n            System.out.println("No banners available.");\n            return;\n        }\n        System.out.println("Available Banners:");\n        for (Banner banner : banners) {\n            System.out.println("  ID: " + banner.getId() + ", Image: " + banner.getImagePath());\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. [{'command_name': 'Editor.write', 'args': {'path': '/home///baselines/MetaGPT/workspace/ModifyBanner_1766836196/ModifyBannerApp.java', 'content': 'package com.example.banner;\n\nimport java.util.Scanner;\n\n/**\n * ModifyBannerApp.java\n * Main application class that simulates the ModifyBanner use case flow.\n * This class demonstrates the steps for a restaurant operator to change a banner image.\n * It includes authentication simulation, listing banners, selecting a banner,\n * image validation, confirmation, and updating.\n * It also handles cancellation and connection interruption scenarios.\n */\npublic class ModifyBannerApp {\n    // Simulate authentication status\n    private boolean authenticated = false;\n    // Scanner for user input\n    private Scanner scanner = new Scanner(System.in);\n    // Banner manager instance\n    private BannerManager bannerManager = BannerManager.getInstance();\n    // Image validator instance\n    private ImageValidator imageValidator = new ImageValidator();\n\n    /**\n     * Main entry point of the application.\n     * @param args command-line arguments (not used)\n     */\n    public static void main(String[] args) {\n        ModifyBannerApp app = new ModifyBannerApp();\n        app.run();\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Runs the main use case flow.\n     */\n    private void run() {\n        System.out.println("=== Modify Banner Use Case Simulation ===");\n        // Step: Authentication (simulated)\n        if (!authenticate()) {\n            System.out.println("Authentication failed. Exiting.");\n            return;\n        }\n\n        // Step: Select editing functionality (implied by choosing to modify banner)\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Editing functionality selected ---");\n        // Step: View list of banners\n        listBanners();\n\n        // Step: Select a banner from the list\n        Banner selectedBanner = selectBanner();\n        if (selectedBanner == null) {\n            System.out.println("No banner selected. Operation cancelled.");\n            return;\n        }\n\n        // Step: Display form for image selection (simulated by entering image path)\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Image Selection Form ---");\n        System.out.println("Selected Banner: " + selectedBanner);\n        String newImagePath = enterImagePath();\n        if (newImagePath == null) {\n            System.out.println("Operation cancelled by user.");\n            return;\n        }\n\n        // Step: Validate image characteristics\n        boolean isValid = validateImage(newImagePath);\n        if (!isValid) {\n            // Enable use case Errored (simulated by printing error and exiting)\n            System.out.println("Image validation failed. Enabling Errored use case.");\n            // In a real system, would trigger error handling flow\n            return;\n        }\n\n        // Step: Ask for confirmation\n        if (!confirmChange()) {\n            System.out.println("Change cancelled by user.");\n            return;\n        }\n\n        // Step: Update banner image\n        boolean success = updateBannerImage(selectedBanner.getId(), newImagePath);\n        if (success) {\n            System.out.println("\\n=== Banner image updated successfully! ===");\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("Failed to update banner image.");\n        }\n\n        // Simulate server connection interruption scenario\n        simulateConnectionInterruption();\n\n        scanner.close();\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Simulates authentication of the restaurant operator.\n     * @return true if authentication successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean authenticate() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Authentication ---");\n        System.out.print("Enter operator username: ");\n        String username = scanner.nextLine();\n        System.out.print("Enter password: ");\n        String password = scanner.nextLine();\n        // Simulated authentication logic (for demonstration, accept any non-empty)\n        if (username != null && !username.trim().isEmpty() && password != null && !password.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            authenticated = true;\n            System.out.println("Authentication successful.");\n            return true;\n        } else {\n            System.out.println("Invalid credentials.");\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Displays the list of banners associated with the restaurant point.\n     */\n    private void listBanners() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Banner List ---");\n        bannerManager.displayBanners();\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Prompts the user to select a banner by ID.\n     * @return the selected Banner object, or null if invalid selection or cancellation\n     */\n    private Banner selectBanner() {\n        System.out.print("\\nEnter the ID of the banner to edit (or \'cancel\' to abort): ");\n        String input = scanner.nextLine();\n        if ("cancel".equalsIgnoreCase(input)) {\n            return null;\n        }\n        Banner banner = bannerManager.getBannerById(input);\n        if (banner == null) {\n            System.out.println("Invalid banner ID. Please try again.");\n            // Recursive retry (simple implementation)\n            return selectBanner();\n        }\n        return banner;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Prompts the user to enter a new image path.\n     * @return the entered image path, or null if cancelled\n     */\n    private String enterImagePath() {\n        System.out.print("Enter the new image file path (or \'cancel\' to abort): ");\n        String path = scanner.nextLine();\n        if ("cancel".equalsIgnoreCase(path)) {\n            return null;\n        }\n        return path;\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image using ImageValidator.\n     * For simulation, we assume dummy file size and dimensions.\n     * @param imagePath the image path to validate\n     * @return true if valid, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean validateImage(String imagePath) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Validating Image ---");\n        try {\n            // Simulated file size and dimensions (in real app, these would be extracted from the image)\n            long fileSize = 1024 * 1024; // 1 MB\n            int width = 800;\n            int height = 600;\n            imageValidator.validate(imagePath, fileSize, width, height);\n            System.out.println("Image validation passed.");\n            return true;\n        } catch (ImageValidator.ImageValidationException e) {\n            System.out.println("Validation error: " + e.getMessage());\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Asks the user for confirmation before changing the banner.\n     * @return true if confirmed, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean confirmChange() {\n        System.out.print("\\nConfirm change of banner image? (yes/no): ");\n        String answer = scanner.nextLine();\n        return "yes".equalsIgnoreCase(answer);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Updates the banner image via BannerManager.\n     * @param bannerId the ID of the banner to update\n     * @param newImagePath the new image path\n     * @return true if update successful, false otherwise\n     */\n    private boolean updateBannerImage(String bannerId, String newImagePath) {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Updating Banner ---");\n        try {\n            return bannerManager.updateBannerImage(bannerId, newImagePath);\n        } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {\n            System.out.println("Update error: " + e.getMessage());\n            return false;\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Simulates a connection interruption to the server ETOUR.\n     * This is a placeholder for handling such scenarios.\n     */\n    private void simulateConnectionInterruption() {\n        System.out.println("\\n--- Simulating connection interruption ---");\n        System.out.println("Connection to server ETOUR lost. Operation may be incomplete.");\n        // In a real system, would trigger rollback or recovery mechanisms\n    }\n}\n'}}, {'command_name': 'Plan.finish_current_task', 'args': {}}]

File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. Exiting.\\");\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Select editing functionality (implied by choosing to modify banner)\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Editing functionality selected ---\\");\\n        // Step: View list of banners\\n        listBanners();\\n\\n        // Step: Select a banner from the list\\n        Banner selectedBanner = selectBanner();\\n        if (selectedBanner == null) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"No banner selected. Operation cancelled.\\");\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Display form for image selection (simulated by entering image path)\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Image Selection Form ---\\");\\n        System.out.println(\\"Selected Banner: \\" + selectedBanner);\\n        String newImagePath = enterImagePath();\\n        if (newImagePath == null) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Operation cancelled by user.\\");\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Validate image characteristics\\n        boolean isValid = validateImage(newImagePath);\\n        if (!isValid) {\\n            // Enable use case Errored (simulated by printing error and exiting)\\n            System.out.println(\\"Image validation failed. Enabling Errored use case.\\");\\n            // In a real system, would trigger error handling flow\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Ask for confirmation\\n        if (!confirmChange()) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Change cancelled by user.\\");\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Update banner image\\n        boolean success = updateBannerImage(selectedBanner.getId(), newImagePath);\\n        if (success) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"\\\\n=== Banner image updated successfully! ===\\");\\n        } else {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Failed to update banner image.\\");\\n        }\\n\\n        // Simulate server connection interruption scenario\\n        simulateConnectionInterruption();\\n\\n        scanner.close();\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Simulates authentication of the restaurant operator.\\n     * @return true if authentication successful, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    private boolean authenticate() {\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Authentication ---\\");\\n        System.out.print(\\"Enter operator username: \\");\\n        String username = scanner.nextLine();\\n        System.out.print(\\"Enter password: \\");\\n        String password = scanner.nextLine();\\n        // Simulated authentication logic (for demonstration, accept any non-empty)\\n        if (username != null && !username.trim().isEmpty() && password != null && !password.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            authenticated = true;\\n            System.out.println(\\"Authentication successful.\\");\\n            return true;\\n        } else {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Invalid credentials.\\");\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Displays the list of banners associated with the restaurant point.\\n     */\\n    private void listBanners() {\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Banner List ---\\");\\n        bannerManager.displayBanners();\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Prompts the user to select a banner by ID.\\n     * @return the selected Banner object, or null if invalid selection or cancellation\\n     */\\n    private Banner selectBanner() {\\n        System.out.print(\\"\\\\nEnter the ID of the banner to edit (or \'cancel\' to abort): \\");\\n        String input = scanner.nextLine();\\n        if (\\"cancel\\".equalsIgnoreCase(input)) {\\n            return null;\\n        }\\n        Banner banner = bannerManager.getBannerById(input);\\n        if (banner == null) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Invalid banner ID. Please try again.\\");\\n            // Recursive retry (simple implementation)\\n            return selectBanner();\\n        }\\n        return banner;\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Prompts the user to enter a new image path.\\n     * @return the entered image path, or null if cancelled\\n     */\\n    private String enterImagePath() {\\n        System.out.print(\\"Enter the new image file path (or \'cancel\' to abort): \\");\\n        String path = scanner.nextLine();\\n        if (\\"cancel\\".equalsIgnoreCase(path)) {\\n            return null;\\n        }\\n        return path;\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Validates the image using ImageValidator.\\n     * For simulation, we assume dummy file size and dimensions.\\n     * @param imagePath the image path to validate\\n     * @return true if valid, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    private boolean validateImage(String imagePath) {\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Validating Image ---\\");\\n        try {\\n            // Simulated file size and dimensions (in real app, these would be extracted from the image)\\n            long fileSize = 1024 * 1024; // 1 MB\\n            int width = 800;\\n            int height = 600;\\n            imageValidator.validate(imagePath, fileSize, width, height);\\n            System.out.println(\\"Image validation passed.\\");\\n            return true;\\n        } catch (ImageValidator.ImageValidationException e) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Validation error: \\" + e.getMessage());\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Asks the user for confirmation before changing the banner.\\n     * @return true if confirmed, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    private boolean confirmChange() {\\n        System.out.print(\\"\\\\nConfirm change of banner image? (yes/no): \\");\\n        String answer = scanner.nextLine();\\n        return \\"yes\\".equalsIgnoreCase(answer);\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Updates the banner image via BannerManager.\\n     * @param bannerId the ID of the banner to update\\n     * @param newImagePath the new image path\\n     * @return true if update successful, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    private boolean updateBannerImage(String bannerId, String newImagePath) {\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Updating Banner ---\\");\\n        try {\\n            return bannerManager.updateBannerImage(bannerId, newImagePath);\\n        } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Update error: \\" + e.getMessage());\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Simulates a connection interruption to the server ETOUR.\\n     * This is a placeholder for handling such scenarios.\\n     */\\n    private void simulateConnectionInterruption() {\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Simulating connection interruption ---\\");\\n        System.out.println(\\"Connection to server ETOUR lost. imagePath the image path to validate\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the image path is invalid\n     */\n    private void validateImage(String imagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException image extensions\n        String lower = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        if (!(lower.endsWith(".jpg") || lower.endsWith(".jpeg") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".png") || lower.endsWith(".gif")
