File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished.           return null;\\n        }\\n        Banner banner = bannerManager.getBannerById(input);\\n        if (banner == null) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Invalid banner ID. imagePath the image path to validate\n     * @throws IllegalArgumentException if the image path is invalid\n     */\n    private void validateImage(String imagePath) throws IllegalArgumentException image extensions\n        String lower = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        if (!(lower.endsWith(".jpg") || lower.endsWith(".jpeg") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".png") || lower.endsWith(".gif") File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. image extensions\n        String lower = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        if (!(lower.endsWith(".jpg") || lower.endsWith(".jpeg") ||\n              lower.endsWith(".png") || lower.endsWith(".gif") File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. File extension validation\n     * 2. File size validation (simulated)\n     * 3. Image dimensions validation (simulated)\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @param fileSize  Size of the image file in bytes (simulated, in real scenario would be obtained from file)\n     * @param width     Image width in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @param height    Image height in pixels (simulated, in real scenario would be read from image metadata)\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if validation fails with detailed message\n     */\n    public void validate(String imagePath, long fileSize, int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        // Step 1: Validate file path is not empty\n        if (imagePath == null || imagePath.trim().isEmpty()) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("Image path cannot be null or empty.");\n        }\n\n        // Step 2: Validate file extension\n        validateExtension(imagePath);\n\n        // Step 3: Validate file size\n        validateFileSize(fileSize);\n\n        // Step 4: Validate image dimensions\n        validateDimensions(width, height);\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file extension of the image.\n     * Checks if the file extension is in the list of allowed extensions.\n     *\n     * @param imagePath Path to the image file\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file extension is not allowed\n     */\n    private void validateExtension(String imagePath) throws ImageValidationException {\n        String lowerPath = imagePath.toLowerCase();\n        boolean valid = false;\n        for (String ext : ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS) {\n            if (lowerPath.endsWith(ext)) {\n                valid = true;\n                break;\n            }\n        }\n        if (!valid) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Invalid image format. Allowed formats: " + String.join(", ", ALLOWED_EXTENSIONS)\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the file size.\n     * Ensures the file size does not exceed the maximum allowed size.\n     *\n     * @param fileSize Size of the image file in bytes\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if the file size exceeds the limit\n     */\n    private void validateFileSize(long fileSize) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (fileSize <= 0) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException("File size must be greater than zero.");\n        }\n        if (fileSize > MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "File size exceeds maximum allowed size of " + MAX_FILE_SIZE_BYTES + " bytes."\n            );\n        }\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Validates the image dimensions.\n     * Ensures the width and height are within the allowed minimum and maximum.\n     *\n     * @param width  Image width in pixels\n     * @param height Image height in pixels\n     * @throws ImageValidationException if dimensions are out of bounds\n     */\n    private void validateDimensions(int width, int height) throws ImageValidationException {\n        if (width < MIN_WIDTH || height < MIN_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too small. Minimum dimensions: " + MIN_WIDTH + "x" + MIN_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        if (width > MAX_WIDTH || height > MAX_HEIGHT) {\n            throw new ImageValidationException(\n                "Image dimensions too large. Maximum dimensions: " + MAX_WIDTH + "x" + MAX_HEIGHT\n            );\n        }\n        // Optionally, check aspect ratio or other constraints\n    }\n\n    /**\n     * Custom exception class for image validation errors.\n     */\n    public static class ImageValidationException extends Exception {\n        public ImageValidationException(String message) {\n            super(message);\n        }\n    }\n}\n\nCommand Plan.finish_current_task executed:Current task is finished. Exiting.\\");\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Select editing functionality (implied by choosing to modify banner)\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Editing functionality selected ---\\");\\n        // Step: View list of banners\\n        listBanners();\\n\\n        // Step: Select a banner from the list\\n        Banner selectedBanner = selectBanner();\\n        if (selectedBanner == null) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"No banner selected. Operation cancelled.\\");\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Display form for image selection (simulated by entering image path)\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Image Selection Form ---\\");\\n        System.out.println(\\"Selected Banner: \\" + selectedBanner);\\n        String newImagePath = enterImagePath();\\n        if (newImagePath == null) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Operation cancelled by user.\\");\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Validate image characteristics\\n        boolean isValid = validateImage(newImagePath);\\n        if (!isValid) {\\n            // Enable use case Errored (simulated by printing error and exiting)\\n            System.out.println(\\"Image validation failed. Enabling Errored use case.\\");\\n            // In a real system, would trigger error handling flow\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Ask for confirmation\\n        if (!confirmChange()) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Change cancelled by user.\\");\\n            return;\\n        }\\n\\n        // Step: Update banner image\\n        boolean success = updateBannerImage(selectedBanner.getId(), newImagePath);\\n        if (success) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"\\\\n=== Banner image updated successfully! ===\\");\\n        } else {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Failed to update banner image.\\");\\n        }\\n\\n        // Simulate server connection interruption scenario\\n        simulateConnectionInterruption();\\n\\n        scanner.close();\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Simulates authentication of the restaurant operator.\\n     * @return true if authentication successful, false otherwise\\n     */\\n    private boolean authenticate() {\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Authentication ---\\");\\n        System.out.print(\\"Enter operator username: \\");\\n        String username = scanner.nextLine();\\n        System.out.print(\\"Enter password: \\");\\n        String password = scanner.nextLine();\\n        // Simulated authentication logic (for demonstration, accept any non-empty)\\n        if (username != null && !username.trim().isEmpty() && password != null && !password.trim().isEmpty()) {\\n            authenticated = true;\\n            System.out.println(\\"Authentication successful.\\");\\n            return true;\\n        } else {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Invalid credentials.\\");\\n            return false;\\n        }\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Displays the list of banners associated with the restaurant point.\\n     */\\n    private void listBanners() {\\n        System.out.println(\\"\\\\n--- Banner List ---\\");\\n        bannerManager.displayBanners();\\n    }\\n\\n    /**\\n     * Prompts the user to select a banner by ID.\\n     * @return the selected Banner object, or null if invalid selection or cancellation\\n     */\\n    private Banner selectBanner() {\\n        System.out.print(\\"\\\\nEnter the ID of the banner to edit (or \'cancel\' to abort): \\");\\n        String input = scanner.nextLine();\\n        if (\\"cancel\\".equalsIgnoreCase(input)) {\\n            return null;\\n        }\\n        Banner banner = bannerManager.getBannerById(input);\\n        if (banner == null) {\\n            System.out.println(\\"Invalid banner ID.
